txt.en:
'My heart dares to hope that we will be prepared for when the Orcs mount their attack.

'There is still time in which to prepare; we must make the most of it. Travel to the Way of Smiths among the Silvertine Lodes and lend your aid to the dwarves working in the Heart of Fire.

'The hammer-blow may fall hardest there, if Mazog were to learn the importance of those forges to our continued resistance. Stóthkell is in charge of the effort there; go to him with my commendation of your merits.'

'It is true, then, this rumour that the Orcs are planning some great assault on us? I was afraid it was so.\n\n'I do not need Bósi's recommendation to know that you are an asset to our efforts here; were it not for you, the Heart of Fire would still be sealed to us!'
'The dwarf in charge of the Heart of Fire is Stóthkell; he will listen to our plight and arrange the best means of preparing to defend the forges that are so valuable to our continued survival.'
Bósi is pleased that you have aided his dwarves with the preparations, and wants you to do the same for the dwarves in the Heart of Fire.

Stóthkell is the dwarf in charge of the Heart of Fire located off the Way of Smiths, among the Silvertine Lodes.\n\nBósi wants you to lend your aid to the dwarves manning the Heart of Fire so they will be prepared if the Orcs attack the Way of Smiths.
